fullText:
Inevitable Challenge

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit: Whenever you miss with a melee basic attack from your Combat Challenge class feature, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 63.
name: Inevitable Challenge
prerequisite: 21st level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
benefit: Whenever you miss with a melee basic attack from your Combat Challenge class feature, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
